name: modern
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: modern
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: designed and made using the most recent ideas and methods

example.egtrans: 现代技术／建筑／医学／艺术

example.eg: We're in the very modern-looking building opposite the station.
example.egtrans: 我们在车站对面那座非常现代化的大楼里。

example.eg: My grandpa's attitudes are very modern, considering his age.
example.egtrans: 考虑到我祖父的年龄的话，他的看法相当新潮。

dsense.name: modern
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: of the present or recent times, especially the period of history since around 1500

example.eg: What do you think is the role of religion in the modern world?
example.egtrans: 你如何看待宗教在现代社会中的角色？
